hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn 'Abbas that 'Ali said:"I got married to Fatimah, may Allah be pleased with her, and I said: 'O Messenger of Allah, let me consummate the marriage.' He said: 'Give her something.' I said: 'I do not have anything.' He said: 'Where is your Hutami armor?' I said: 'It is with me.' He said: 'Give it to her

chapter.eng-name: A Gift Given Before Consummation Of The Marriage
